clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Evaluating the Duration of Efficacy of One Intra Articular Injection of Sodium Hyaluronate 2.0% in Patients With Painful Osteoarthritis of the Knee
clinical_study.official_title: A Pilot, Open, Randomised, Controlled, add-on Study Evaluating the Duration of Efficacy of One Intra Articular Injection of Sodium Hyaluronate 2.0% in Patients With Painful Osteoarthritis of the Knee

brief_summary.textblock: A pilot, open, randomised, controlled, add-on study evaluating the duration of efficacy of one intra articular injection of sodium hyaluronate 2.0% in patients with painful osteoarthritis of the knee

primary_outcome.measure: to evaluate the duration of efficacy of one intra articular injection of Ostenil® Plus in patients with painful osteoarthritis of the knee.

secondary_outcome.measure: to evaluate the effects of the study treatment on pain, joint stiffness, joint function and need for analgesic consumption.

arm_group.description: Patient will get Ostenil plus injection and standard treatment of Osteoarthritis
